channel.title: Allow butlers to poision king after king exe a bd or force exe bd
channel.description: Its doesnt make sense that king can exe n2 and buter can only use poision d4. He should be able to poision king earlier if king executing a blue dragon player. Killing evil king n5 after he used all of his abilities is useless

item.title: Allow butlers to poision king after king exe a bd or force exe bd
item.dc:creator: Eran_Shmuel
item.description:
Sam17z:

Ok so let’s meet in the middle if the King uses force exe or order exe before day 4 butlers can poison him before day 4. It’s like a clause in the terms of service if force exe and order exe

That what I said

Read full topic
item.source: Allow butlers to poision king after king exe a bd or force exe bd

item.title: Allow butlers to poision king after king exe a bd or force exe bd
item.dc:creator: Eran_Shmuel
item.description:
Twil1ight:

I’m kinda dope with Butler’s Poison.

How about just remove it and actually don’t care about it?

Butler’s job isn’t murdening the King and commiting sudoku in 2/3 times.

Just saying.

Well if he is stupid then he should lose.

Read full topic

item.title: Allow butlers to poision king after king exe a bd or force exe bd
item.dc:creator: mathmods
item.description:
Haha, it truly is shiny. That’s why I have almost never used it
Shiny stuff tends to be the scariest.

(When I actually DID use it, it was on a GK that upped the confirmed guy because he didn’t have his claim, as in, he was quite airheaded.)

item.title: Allow butlers to poision king after king exe a bd or force exe bd
item.dc:creator: Morcille
item.description:
I kind of hate how butlers work… It’s enraging to do your best as good king to always have a retarded that poisons you because pressing a simple button to kill the king is just too tempting…

item.title: Allow butlers to poision king after king exe a bd or force exe bd
item.dc:creator: mathmods
item.description:
Though I’m NOT in agreement to Butler being capable of using poison on King before d4.
I am in agreement to him being capable of using it while Trial is ongoing. Like CL.
I do not think he should be capable of poisoning king if he is personally on trial, but otherwise…

Read full topic
item.source: Allow butlers to poision king after king exe a bd or force exe bd

item.title: Allow butlers to poision king after king exe a bd or force exe bd
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Eran_Shmuel:

Its doesnt make sense that king can exe n2 and buter can only use poision d4.
He should be able to poision king earlier if king executing a blue dragon player.
Killing evil king n5 after he used all of his abilities is useless

The only problem I see with this is a king making a mistake and both of them dying.

(JUST DON’T YOLO ITS NOT WORTH IT ONLY WHEN A PRINCE GETS DF)

Read full topic
